summary.span: 显示用于使用指定列筛选表行的 UI。

span.span: Displays the UI for filtering table rows using a specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [ClassContextClassContext](#ClassContext) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件在页标记中用于生成用于筛选表行的 UI。The control is used in a page markup to generate the UI for filtering table rows. 动态数据使用 ~ \DynamicData\Filters 文件夹中的默认筛选器模板创建 UI。Dynamic Data creates the UI by using the default filter templates that are in the ~\DynamicData\Filters folder. 这些模板支持外键、布尔值和枚举列类型。These templates support foreign-key, Boolean, and enumeration column types. 下表显示了您可以执行的一些任务。The following table shows some of the tasks you can perform. |方案Scenario|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| |指定要用于表行筛选的列。Specify the column to use for table row filtering.|使用属性指定要用于表行筛选的列。Use the property to specify the column to use for table row filtering.| |指定用于创建 UI 的筛选器模板的名称。Specify the name of the filter template to use to create the UI.|使用 "属性 " 指定用于创建 UI 的筛选器模板的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the filter template to use to create the UI.| |在呈现 UI 之前执行自定义操作。Perform custom operations before the UI is rendered.|在呈现 UI 之前, 使用执行自定义操作。Use the to perform custom operations before the UI is rendered.| 您可以按以下方式指定筛选器模板以供使用:You can specify the filter template to use in the following ways: - 通过使用页标记中的属性。By using the property in page markup. 此方法是一种表示层自定义项, 它独立于架构 (数据库), 适用于单个页面。This approach is a presentation-layer customization, which is independent of the schema (database), and which applies to a single page. - 通过使用模型中的属性。By using the attribute in the model. 此方法是一种数据层自定义, 它依赖于特定架构 (数据库), 并应用于整个应用程序。This approach is a data-layer customization, which depends on the specific schema (database), and which applies to the entire application. 如果使用这两种方法, 则标记中指定的筛选器模板将优先于数据模型中所指定的模板。If you use both approaches, the filter template that is specified in the markup takes precedence over the template that is specified in the data model. ## 类上下文Class Context 控件设计为与控件一起使用。 The control is designed to work with the control. 控件由页面标记中对象内的实例引用。 The control is referenced by a instance inside a object in the page markup. 下图显示了为了通过外键列实现表行筛选而动态数据遵循的步骤。The following figure shows the steps that Dynamic Data follows in order to implement table row filtering by a foreign-key column. ![动态数据查询元素](~/add/media/dynamic-dataquery.png "动态数据查询元素")![Dynamic Data Query Elements](~/add/media/dynamic-dataquery.png "Dynamic Data Query Elements") 1. 控件将所选值传递到控件。 The control passes the selected value to the control. 2. 控件使用值来创建查询筛选信息。The control uses the value to create the query filtering information. 然后, 它将此信息传递到数据源控件。It then passes this information to the data source control. 3. 数据源控件将筛选查询信息传递到数据源提供程序。The data source control passes the filtering query information to the data source provider. 4. 数据源提供程序将查询传递到数据库。The data source provider passes the query to the database. 5. 数据库返回筛选的表行。The database returns the filtered table rows. 6. 数据源提供程序将此数据发送回数据源控件。The data source provider sends this data back to the data source control. 7. 数据源控件将筛选的表行传递到数据绑定控件以便显示。The data source control passes the filtered table rows to the data-bound control for display. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 此位置提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 项目:[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available at this location: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914). 下面的示例使用默认的 ForeignKey 筛选器模板创建用于按 ProductCategory 外键列筛选 Products 表行的 UI。The following examples use the default ForeignKey.ascx filter template to create the UI for filtering the Products table rows by the ProductCategory foreign-key column. 当用户选择 ProductCategory 值时, 将仅显示包含该值的行。When the user selects a ProductCategory value, only the rows that contain that value are displayed. 该示例需要以下各项:The example requires the following: - 动态数据网站或动态数据 Web 应用程序。A Dynamic Data Web site or a Dynamic Data Web application. 这使您可以创建数据库`AdventureWorksLTDataContext`的数据上下文, 并为要访问的表创建类。This enables you to create the `AdventureWorksLTDataContext` data context for the database and to create the classes for the tables to access. 有关详细信息，请参阅 `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.
